column1: S091.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S091.DECK.  091. SURVEY NUMBER
S091.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S091.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR RANK OR GRAD?  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN/5. 4. SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN/4. 5. STAFF SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN/3. 6. TECHNICAL SGT., MASTER SGT., OR FIRST SGT. 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  01. 18 YEARS OR YOUNGER 02. 19 YEARS 03. 20 YEARS 04. 21 YEARS 05. 22 YEARS 06. 23 YEARS 07. 24 YEARS 08. 25 YEARS 09. 26 THRU 29 YEARS 10. 30 THRU 34 YEARS 11. 35 YEARS AND OVER 00. NO ANSWER
S091.Q3. ARE YOU ...*  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED BEFORE JOINING ARMY 3. MARRIED AFTER JOINING ARMY 4. WIDOWED, DIVORCED, OR SEPARATED 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q4. HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAV?  1. I'M NOT MARRIED 2. HAVE NO CHILDREN 3. HAVE ONE CHILD 4. HAVE MORE THAN ONE CHILD 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q5. CHECK THE ANSWER THAT TELLS BEST HOW FAR YOU WENT IN SCHOOL:  1. DID NOT FINISH GRADE SCHOOL 2. FINISHED GRADE SCHOOL 3. HAD SOME HIGH SCHOOL, BUT DID NOT GRADUATE 4. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 5. HAD SOME COLLEGE, BUT DID NOT GRADUATE 6. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 7. NO ANSWER

S091.Q6. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARM? E. FOR NATIONAL GUARD TROOPS THIS MEANS ACTIVE SERVICE.  1. SIX MONTHS OR LESS 2. MORE THAN 6 MONTHS BUT NOT OVER 1 YEAR 3. MORE THAN 1 YEAR BUT NOT OVER 2 YEARS 4. MORE THAN 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q7. HOW DID YOU COME INTO THE ARM?  1. I WAS DRAFTED 2. I VOLUNTEERED 3. I WAS IN THE NATIONAL GUARD 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S091.Q8. WHAT MONTH AND YEAR DID YOU JOIN THIS DIVISIO?  1. OCTOBER 31, 1942 OR EARLIER 2. NOVEMBER 1, 1942 TO MAY 10, 1943 3. MAY 11, 1943 TO JULY 9, 1943 4. JULY 10, 1943 TO AUGUST 31, 1943 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q9. ON THE WHOLE HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE ARM?  1. I LIKE THE ARMY VERY MUCH 2. I LIKE IT FAIRLY WELL 3. I RATHER DISLIKE IT 4. I DISLIKE THE ARMY VERY MUCH 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q10. ON THE WHOLE, HOW IS THE MORALE OF THE MEN IN YOUR COMPAN?  1. VERY HIGH 2. FAIRLY HIGH 3. JUST SO-SO 4. FAIRLY LOW 5. VERY LOW 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S091.Q11. ON THE WHOLE, DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS GIVING YOU A CHANCE TO SHOW WHAT YOU CAN D?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q12. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR COMPAN?  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q13. HOW WELL HAVE YOU BEEN ABLE TO FIT YOURSELF INTO ARMY LIF?  1. VERY WELL ON THE WHOLE 2. PRETTY WELL ON THE WHOLE 3. FIT IN MORE OR LESS 4. NOT WELL ON THE WHOLE 5. HAVEN'T BEEN ABLE TO FIT INTO ARMY LIFE AT ALL 6. NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q14. WHEN YOU ARE ON YOUR JOB HOW ENTHUSIASTIC DO YOU USUALLY FEEL ABOUT WHAT YOU ARE DOIN?  1. VERY ENTHUSIASTIC 2. FAIRLY ENTHUSIASTIC 3. NOT VERY ENTHUSIASTIC 4. HAVE NO ENTHUSIASM AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q15. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING WOULD YOU SAY BEST APPLIES TO YOUR JO?  1. TIME ALWAYS PASSES QUICKLY 2. TIME PASSES QUICKLY MOST OF THE TIME 3. ENJOY WORKING PART OF THE TIME, BUT IT DRAGS AT OTHER TIMES 4. TIME DRAGS MOST OF THE TIME 5. TIME ALWAYS DRAGS 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q16. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRIT?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q17. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU REALLY BELONG IN YOUR COMPANY AND ARE AN IMPORTANT PART OF I?  1. VERY MUCH SO 2. FAIRLY MUCH SO 3. NOT VERY MUCH 4. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q18A. WHAT SORT OF TEAMWORK AND CO-OPERATION DO THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY HAVE ON THE JO?  1. VERY GOOD 2. FAIRLY GOOD 3. NOT VERY GOOD 4. NOT GOOD AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q18B. WHAT SORT OF TEAMWORK DID THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY SHOW IN ACTUAL BATTL?  1. VERY GOOD 2. FAIRLY GOOD 3. NOT VERY GOOD 4. NOT GOOD AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q19. WOULD YOU SAY THAT MOST OF THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY USUALLY PUT ALL THAT THEY HAVE INTO THEIR REGULAR DUTIES, OR DO THEY USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET B?  1. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY PUT ALL THAT THEY HAVE INTO IT 2. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q20. HOW ABOUT YOURSELF - WOULD YOU HONESTLY SAY THAT YOU USUALLY PUT ALL YOU HAVE INTO YOUR REGULAR DUTIES, OR DO YOU USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET B?  1. I USUALLY PUT ALL I HAVE INTO IT 2. I USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q21. HOW SATISFIED ARE YOU ABOUT BEING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB INSTEAD OF SOME OTHER ARMY JO?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. IT DOESN'T MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 4. DISSATISFIED 5. VERY DISSATISFIED 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q22. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE IMPORTANCE OF THE RIFLEMAN'S JOB IN MODERN BATTL?  1. MORE IMPORTANT THAN MOST ANY OTHER SOLDIER'S JOB 2. IMPORTANT, BUT NO MORE SO THAN MANY OTHERS 3. NOT VERY IMPORTANT COMPARED WITH WHAT OTHER SOLDIERS CAN DO 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q23. WOULD YOU CONSIDER THAT YOU WERE DOING A MORE IMPORTANT JOB IN HELPING WIN THE WAR IF YOU WERE A GUNNER IN A B-27 BOMBER INSTEAD OF AN INFANTRYMA?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q24. WOULD YOU CONSIDER THAT YOU WERE DOING A MORE IMPORTANT JOB IN WINNING THE WAR IF YOU WERE DRIVING A QUARTERMASTER TRUCK INSTEAD OF YOUR PRESENT ARMY JO?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q25. WOULD YOU CONSIDER THAT YOU WERE DOING A MORE IMPORTANT JOB IN WINNING THE WAR IF YOU WERE DRIVING A TANK INSTEAD OF YOUR PRESENT ARMY JO?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q26. WOULD YOU CONSIDER THAT YOU WERE DOING A MORE IMPORTANT JOB IN WINNING THE WAR IF YOU WERE A CLERK IN HEADQUARTER?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q27. WOULD YOU CONSIDER THAT YOU WERE DOING A MORE IMPORTANT JOB IN WINNING THE WAR IF YOU WERE A COMBAT ENGINEER INSTEAD OF YOUR PRESENT ARMY JO?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S091.Q28. HOW IMPORTANT A PART DO YOU THINK YOUR COMPANY WILL PLAY IN WINNING THE WA?  1. A VERY IMPORTANT PART 2. A FAIRLY IMPORTANT PART 3. NOT A VERY IMPORTANT PART 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q29. DO YOU USUALLY FEEL THAT WHAT YOU ARE DOING IN THE ARMY IS WORTHWHILE OR NO?  1. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS NOT WORTHWHILE 2. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS WORTHWHILE 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S091.Q30. WHEN YOU WERE FIGHTING IN A PARTICULAR BATTLE, DID YOU EVER HAVE THE FEELING THAT IT WASN'T WORTH THE COS?  1. YES, ALMOST ALWAYS 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO, NEVER 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q31. DO YOU THINK THE ARMY TRIED HARD ENOUGH TO GET MAIL REGULARLY TO YOU AT THE BATTLE FRON?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q32. DO YOU THINK THE ARMY TRIED HARD ENOUGH TO GET GOOD FOOD TO YOU AT THE BATTLE FRON?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S091.Q33. HOW DID YOU FEEL ABOUT THE DIVISION NEWS SHEET WHICH YOU GOT AT THE BATTLE FRON?  1. I LIKED IT 2. I LIKED IT, BUT THINK IT COULD HAVE BEEN BETTER 3. I DID NOT LIKE IT 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q34. WHILE YOU WERE AT THE BATTLE FRONT, DID YOUR LEADERS EXPLAIN THE WHOLE BATTLE SO YOU COULD SEE JUST HOW YOUR COMPANY'S PART FITTED INTO THE CAMPAIGN AS A WHOL?  1. AS MUCH AS THEY COULD 2. THEY COULD HAVE GIVEN US A LITTLE MORE 3. THEY COULD HAVE GIVEN US A GREAT DEAL MORE 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q35. WOULD YOU HAVE LIKED TO HAVE A BETTER PICTURE OF HOW YOUR COMPANY'S PART FITTED INTO THE CAMPAIGN AS A WHOL?  1. YES 2. IT MAKES NO DIFFERENCE 3. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q36. WHEN YOU WERE IN COMBAT HOW WELL DID YOU FEEL THAT HEADQUARTERS UNDERSTOOD YOUR PROBLEMS AND NEED?  1. I FELT THEY WERE VERY MUCH AWARE OF OUR NEEDS 2. I FELT THAT THEY WERE FAIRLY WELL AWARE OF OUR NEEDS 3. I FELT THAT THEY DID NOT KNOW VERY MUCH ABOUT OUR REAL PROBLEMS OR NEEDS 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q37. WHILE YOU WERE IN COMBAT, DID YOU FEEL THAT THE TROOPS TO THE REAR, IN GENERAL, WERE DOING AS MUCH AS THEY COULD, UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES, FOR THE MEN WHO WERE DOING THE FIGHTIN?  1. AS MUCH AS THEY COULD 2. COULD HAVE DONE SOMEWHAT MORE 3. COULD HAVE DONE A GREAT DEAL MORE 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q38. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE JOB SPECIAL SERVICE DID FOR THE MEN WHEN THEY CAME OUT OF BATTL?  1. USUALLY VERY GOOD 2. USUALLY PRETTY GOOD 3. USUALLY PRETTY BAD 4. USUALLY VERY BAD 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q39A. DID YOU EVER HAVE ANY CONTACT WITH GERMAN PRISONER?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q39B. HOW DID SEEING GERMAN PRISONERS MAKE YOU FEEL ABOUT THE GERMAN?  1. I FELT ALL THE MORE LIKE KILLING THEM 2. I FELT THAT THEY ARE MEN JUST LIKE US AND IT IS TOO BAD THAT WE HAVE TO BE FIGHTING THEM 3. I DIDN'T HAVE ANY FEELING ONE WAY OR ANOTHER 4. SOME OTHER FEELING 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q40. HOW ABOUT ATROCITIE? DID YOU PERSONALLY EVER SEE WITH YOUR OWN EYES A CASE OF GERMANS USING METHODS OF FIGHTING OR TREATING PRISONERS WHICH YOU WOULD CALL DIRTY OR INHUMA?  1. NO 2. YES 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q41. HOW ABOUT STORIES YOU HAVE HEARD FROM OTHER? DID YOU HEAR ANY TRUE CASES OF GERMANS USING METHODS OF FIGHTING OR TREATING PRISONERS WHICH YOU WOULD CALL DIRTY OR INHUMA?  1. NO 2. YES 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q42. DID YOU SEE ANY OF YOUR BEST FRIENDS GET KILLED IN COMBA?  1. NO 2. YES 0. NO ANSWER F. IF YES, ASK:

S091.Q42A. WHAT WAS YOUR IMMEDIATE REACTIO? (IF THIS HAPPENED MORE THAN ONCE, TELL ABOUT THE FIRST TIME.)  1. ANGER, HATRED, DESIRE FOR REVENGE: ONE THAT GOT HIM, REVENGE, LOST TEMPER, SORROW FOLLOWED BY ANGER, SORRY AND REVENGE, STUNNED, SAD - THEN KILL, SCARED - THEN KILL 2. FEAR, HOPELESSNESS, LOST FEELING: SHOCK FOLLOWED BY FEAR, HOPELESSNESS, LOST FEELING 3. SHOCK, BUT NEITHER FEAR NOR ANGER: SURPRISE OR SHOCK, FOLLOWED BY MATTER-OF-FACTNESS, STUNNED BUT IT PASSED, SURPRISED, THEN TAKEN FOR GRANTED 4. EXPRESSED FACT THAT HAD NO FEELING: NO FEELING, NO TIME FOR THAT IN COMBAT, I'D SEEN TOO MUCH OF THAT ALREADY 5. SORROW: FELT BAD, FELT SORROW, HURT 6. INCREASED THOUGHTS OF OWN CHANCES, BECAME MORE CAUTIOUS 7. MISCELLANEOUS: FACTUAL ACCOUNT GIVEN, NO EMOTION RECORDED - DESCRIBES WHAT ACTION HE TOOK HIMSELF, REPRESSION - DIDN'T WANT TO THINK ABOUT IT, UNCLASSIFIED 8. FATALISM 9. NO ANSWER TO Q.42A OR NO TO Q.42 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S091.Q43. WHICH MAIN BATTLES WERE YOU I?  1. TUNISIAN CAMPAIGN - ANY OF THE FOLLOWING: TEBORBA, ORAN, EL GUETTAR, GAFSA, MATEUR, ST. CLOUD, MEDZ EL BAB, CASABLANCA, MOROCCO, ALGERIA, NORTH AFRICA, BIZERTE, MEDJES, ELBAB, KASSERINE PASS 2. SICILIAN CAMPAIGN - ANY OF THE FOLLOWING: GELA, TROINA, RANDASSO 3. BOTH TUNISIAN AND SICILIAN 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q44. DID YOU RECEIVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING DECORATION?  1. YES, PURPLE HEART 2. YES, SILVER STAR 3. YES, BOTH SILVER STAR AND PURPLE HEART 4. NO, NEITHER 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q45. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE SILVER STA?  1. ALL MEN I KNOW WHO GOT THEM REALLY DESERVED THEM 2. A FEW MEN I KNOW WHO GOT THEM DID NOT DESERVE THEM 3. MANY MEN I KNOW WHO GOT THEM DID NOT DESERVE THEM 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q46. DO YOU KNOW ANY MEN WHO DESERVED SILVER STARS BUT DID NOT GET THE?  1. MANY MEN I KNOW DESERVED SILVER STARS BUT DID NOT GET THEM 2. A FEW MEN I KNOW DESERVED SILVER STARS BUT DID NOT GET THEM 3. NOBODY I KNOW DESERVED A SILVER STAR BUT DID NOT GET IT 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q47. DO YOU THINK YOU WERE IN TOUGH ENOUGH PHYSICAL CONDITION AT THE TIME YOU WENT INTO YOUR FIRST BATTL?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q48. IS THERE ANY TYPE OF TRAINING YOU THINK NEW TROOPS SHOULD BE GETTING MORE OF BEFORE BEING SENT INTO YOUR OUTFIT AS REPLACEMENT?  1. NO 2. YES 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q49. IS THERE ANY TYPE OF TRAINING WHICH YOU THINK NEW TROOPS GET TOO MUCH OF BECAUSE IT DOES NOT HELP IN BATTL?  1. NO, THEY NEED EVERYTHING THEY GET 2. YES 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q50. WOULD YOU SAY THAT THE MORE YOU EXPERIENCED DIVE BOMBING THE LESS FRIGHTENING IT BECAME, OR THE MORE FRIGHTENIN?  1. IT BECAME MORE FRIGHTENING THE MORE I SAW OF IT 2. IT BECAME LESS FRIGHTENING THE MORE I SAW OF IT 3. IT WAS NEVER FRIGHTENING 4. IT STAYED FRIGHTENING ALL THE TIME 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q51. WHAT ABOUT LAND MINE?  1. THEY BECAME MORE FRIGHTENING THE MORE I SAW OF THEM 2. THEY BECAME LESS FRIGHTENING THE MORE I SAW OF THEM 3. THEY WERE NEVER FRIGHTENING 4. THEY STAYED FRIGHTENING ALL THE TIME 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q52. HOW ABOUT 88-MM. FIR?  1. IT BECAME MORE FRIGHTENING THE MORE I SAW OF IT 2. IT BECAME LESS FRIGHTENING THE MORE I SAW OF IT 3. IT WAS NEVER FRIGHTENING 4. IT STAYED FRIGHTENING ALL THE TIME 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q53. HOW ABOUT MACHINE-GUN FIR?  1. IT BECAME MORE FRIGHTENING THE MORE I SAW OF IT 2. IT BECAME LESS FRIGHTENING THE MORE I SAW OF IT 3. IT WAS NEVER FRIGHTENING 4. IT STAYED FRIGHTENING ALL THE TIME 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q54. HOW ABOUT MORTAR FIR?  1. IT BECAME MORE FRIGHTENING THE MORE I SAW OF IT 2. IT BECAME LESS FRIGHTENING THE MORE I SAW OF IT 3. IT WAS NEVER FRIGHTENING 4. IT STAYED FRIGHTENING ALL THE TIME 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S091.Q55. IN GENERAL WOULD YOU SAY THAT BATTLE FIGHTING BECAME MORE FRIGHTENING OR LESS FRIGHTENING THE MORE YOU SAW OF I?  1. IT WAS MORE FRIGHTENING THE MORE I SAW OF IT 2. IT WAS LESS FRIGHTENING THE MORE I SAW OF IT 3. IT WAS NEVER FRIGHTENING 4. IT STAYED FRIGHTENING ALL THE TIME 0. NO ANSWER P. THE OFFICE OF THE SURGEON GENERAL IS INTERESTED IN FINDING OUT FROM MEN LIKE YOURSELF WITH PROVED COMBAT EXPERIENCE, INFORMATION WHICH WILL AID IN SELECTION OF MEN FOR TYPES OF COMBAT DUTY. WHATEVER YOU MAY THINK OF QUESTIONS 56-61, PLEASE ANSWER THEM SERIOUSLY AND CONSCIENTIOUSLY, AS THE INFORMATION WHEN THEY ARE ALL TABULATED SCIENTIFICALLY WILL BE VALUABLE.
S091.Q56. HOW OFTEN DID YOU GET INTO FIGHTS WHEN YOU WERE A KI?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q57. WERE YOU A GOOD FIGHTER AS A KI?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q58. HOW DID YOU FEEL ABOUT FIGHTING AS A KI?  1. REALLY LIKED FIGHTING 2. DIDN'T PARTICULARLY LIKE IT OR DISLIKE IT 3. DIDN'T LIKE FIGHTING AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q59. AS A CHILD HOW DID YOU FEEL ABOUT GOING TO SCHOO?  1. REALLY WANTED VERY MUCH TO GO 2. DIDN'T CARE VERY MUCH WHETHER I WENT TO SCHOOL OR NOT 3. DID NOT AT ALL WANT TO GO 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q60. BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY DID YOU USUALLY GO AROUND WITH A BUNCH OF OTHERS OR BY YOURSEL?  1. I USUALLY WENT AROUND BY MYSELF 2. I USUALLY WENT AROUND WITH JUST ONE OR TWO OTHERS 3. I USUALLY WENT AROUND WITH A BUNCH OF OTHERS 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q61A. BEING LEFT ALON?  1. VERY MUCH 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q61B. BEING ON HIGH PLACE?  1. VERY MUCH 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q61C. WALKING BY A GRAVEYARD AT NIGH?  1. VERY MUCH 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q61D. BEING SHUT UP IN A ROOM OR CLOSE?  1. VERY MUCH 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S091.Q61E. BEING ALONE IN THE DAR?  1. VERY MUCH 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q61F. THUNDERSTORM?  1. VERY MUCH 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q61G. STRANGER?  1. VERY MUCH 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q61H. FALLIN?  1. VERY MUCH 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER CARD 2

S091.Q61T. THOUGHTS OF DEAT?  1. VERY MUCH 2. A LITTLE 3. NOT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S091.V61U. NUMBER OF "VERY MUCH" ANSWERS CHECKED TO Q.61.  01. 1 "VERY MUCH" ANSWER CHECKED 02. 2 03. 3 04. 4 05. 5 06. 6 OR 7 07. 8 OR 9 08. 10 OR 11 09. 12 OR 13 10. 14 OR MORE 11. NO "VERY MUCH" ANSWERS CHECKED 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S091.V61V. NUMBER OF ITEMS TO WHICH THERE IS NO ANSWER (OR ITEM DOUBLE CHECKED) TO Q.61*  01. 1 NO ANSWER CHECKED 02. 2 03. 3 04. 4 05. 5 06. 6 OR 7 07. 8 OR 9 08. 10 OR 11 09. 12 OR 13 10. 14 TO 19 11. NO ANSWER TO WHOLE QUESTION 00. EVERY ITEM CHECKED
S091.Q62. BEFORE GOING INTO COMBAT WERE YOU EVER A.W.O.L.*  1. NO 2. YES 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q63. AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY, BUT BEFORE YOU WENT INTO COMBAT, WERE YOU EVER PUNISHED FOR BREAKING RULES OR REGULATION?  1. NEVER 2. ONCE OR TWICE 3. SEVERAL TIMES 4. QUITE A FEW TIMES 5. NO ANSWER
S091.Q64. AFTER YOU WENT INTO COMBAT, WERE YOU EVER PUNISHED FOR BREAKING RULES OR REGULATION?  1. NEVER 2. ONCE OR TWICE 3. SEVERAL TIMES 4. QUITE A FEW TIMES 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q65. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS BEST TELLS THE WAY YOU WOULD FEEL ABOUT GOING BACK INTO ACTUAL BATTL?  01. I WANT VERY MUCH TO GET INTO IT AS SOON AS POSSIBLE 02. I AM READY TO GO ANY TIME 03. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO, BUT IF I DO, THINK I WILL DO O.K. 04. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO, BECAUSE I DON'T THINK I WILL DO VERY WELL 05. NONE OF THE ABOVE, HAVE DONE MY SHARE, LET OTHERS FIGHT 06. NONE OF THE ABOVE, NEED A REST OR FURLOUGH FIRST 07. NONE OF THE ABOVE, COULDN'T STAND IT, AFRAID, NERVES SHOT 08. NONE OF THE ABOVE, PHYSICAL CONDITION 09. QUALIFIED ACCEPTANCE 10. REFUSAL (MISCELLANEOUS) 11. ALL OTHERS 00. NO ANSWER
S091.Q66. ARE YOU EVER WORRIED AND UPSE?  1. I AM HARDLY EVER WORRIED AND UPSET 2. I AM SOMETIMES WORRIED AND UPSET 3. I AM OFTEN WORRIED AND UPSET 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S091.Q67. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARM?  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT'S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q68. HAVE LETTERS FROM HOME EVER CONTAINED NEWS THAT WORRIED YO?  1. YES, OFTEN 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S091.Q69. HOW WOULD YOU FEEL ABOUT NEWS OF SICKNESS OR TROUBLE IN THE FAMIL?  1. I WOULD WANT TO HEAR ABOUT IT RIGHT AWAY 2. I WOULD RATHER THEY WOULD WAIT UNTIL THE SICKNESS OR TROUBLE IS OVER BEFORE THEY TELL ME 3. I WOULD RATHER THEY WOULDN'T MENTION THE SICKNESS OR TROUBLE AT ALL 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S091.Q70. DO YOU THINK THAT THE EQUIPMENT OF THE AMERICAN ARMY IS BETTER OR WORSE THAN THE EQUIPMENT OF THE GERMAN ARM?  1. ALL OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS BETTER 2. MOST OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS BETTER 3. OUR EQUIPMENT IS ABOUT THE SAME AS THAT OF THE GERMAN ARMY 4. MOST OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS WORSE 5. ALL OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS WORSE 6. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q71. IF YOU THINK SOME GERMAN WEAPONS ARE BETTER THAN OURS WHAT ARE THE?  1. NO GERMAN WEAPONS ARE BETTER THAN OURS 2. SOME GERMAN WEAPONS ARE BETTER THAN OURS 3. NO ANSWER

S091.Q72. IF YOU WERE GIVEN A SQUAD OF MEN AND TOLD TO TAKE CHARGE OF THEM ALL BY YOURSELF IN A COMBAT MISSION UNDER ENEMY FIRE, HOW WELL DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD D?  1. VERY WELL 2. FAIRLY WELL 3. NOT VERY WELL 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S091.Q73. HOW MANY OF THE NON-COMS IN YOUR OUTFIT ARE THE KIND YOU WOULD WANT TO SERVE UNDER IN COMBA?  1. ALL OF THEM ARE 2. MOST OF THEM ARE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM ARE 4. FEW OF THEM ARE 5. NONE OF THEM ARE 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S091.Q74. HOW MANY OF THE OFFICERS IN YOUR COMPANY ARE THE KIND YOU WOULD WANT TO SERVE UNDER IN COMBA?  1. ALL OF THEM ARE 2. MOST OF THEM ARE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM ARE 4. FEW OF THEM ARE 5. NONE OF THEM ARE 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S091.Q75. HOW MANY OF YOUR COMPANY OFFICERS ARE THE KIND WHO ARE WILLING TO GO THROUGH ANYTHING THEY ASK THEIR MEN TO GO THROUG?  1. ALL OF THEM ARE 2. MOST OF THEM ARE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM ARE 4. FEW OF THEM ARE 5. NONE OF THEM ARE 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q76. HOW MANY OF YOUR OFFICERS TAKE A PERSONAL INTEREST IN THEIR ME?  1. ALL OF THEM DO 2. MOST OF THEM DO 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM DO 4. FEW OF THEM DO 5. NONE OF THEM DO 0. NO ANSWER

S091.Q77. DO YOU EVER FEEL THAT YOU ARE NOT AS GOOD A SOLDIER AS MOST OF THE OTHER MEN IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. I FEEL THAT WAY NEARLY ALL OF THE TIME 2. I FEEL THAT WAY FAIRLY OFTEN 3. I FEEL THAT WAY ONLY ONCE IN A WHILE 4. I ALMOST NEVER FEEL THAT WAY 0. NO ANSWER
S091.Q78. DO YOU EVER GET THE FEELING THAT THIS WAR IS NOT WORTH FIGHTIN?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONLY ONCE IN A GREAT WHILE 4. NEVER 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S091.Q79. DO YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER WAR IN THE NEXT 25 YEARS OR S?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

SAME AFTER THE WAR AS BEFORE THE WAR 3. BETTER AFTER THE WAR THAN BEFORE THE WAR 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S091.Q81. ABOUT HOW MUCH LONGER FROM NOW DO YOU GUESS THE WAR WILL LAST WITH GERMAN?  01. LESS THAN A YEAR, OR JUST 1943, OR A TIME NAMED BETWEEN DECEMBER, 1943 AND NOVEMBER, 1944 02. ONE YEAR (OR DECEMBER 1944) 03. OVER ONE YEAR BUT LESS THAN TWO 04. TWO YEARS 05. OVER TWO YEARS BUT LESS THAN THREE 06. THREE YEARS 07. OVER THREE YEARS 08. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING A SHORT TIME E.G. "NOT LONG" 09. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING A LONG TIME E.G. "WILL LAST SEVERAL YEARS" 10. INDEFINITE ANSWER WITH NO INDICATION OF TIME, E.G. "WILL LAST UNTIL WE STOP IT" 11. DON'T KNOW OR UNDECIDED 12. NO ANSWER

S091.Q82. WHICH COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR IDEA OF HOW HARD IT IS GOING TO BE TO BEAT THE GERMAN?  1. IT WILL NOT BE VERY HARD 2. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB BUT OUR LOSSES WON'T BE HEAVY 3. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB, WITH HEAVY LOSSES OF MEN AND EQUIPMENT 0. NO ANSWER

THEY DIDN'T TRY MUCH TO HELP AND DIDN'T SEEM TO KNOW MUCH ABOUT IT 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

YES, LISTEN; MOSTLY LIES, BUT MAYBE A LITTLE MORE TRUTH THAN WE CARE TO ADMIT 3. YES, LISTEN; A LOT OF TRUTH IN WHAT THEY SAID 4. YES, LISTEN; NO ANSWER TO PART B 5. NO, DO NOT LISTEN 0. NO ANSWER
